review: Good product but complicated, Netflix streaming was not able to maintain HD quality
author: Amazon Customer

review: It is an excellent product to mirror your tablet or chrome book to your tv. mine is connected to a receiver. Chromebook is also an excellent item.if you like you tube or searching the net.
author: Alexander C.

review: Works great with my iPad but limited in terms of apps. With computer it can be grainy even when wi-fi is strong; overall a great alternate to pricey Apple TV
author: Amanda T.

review: It is very unresponsive! It freezes and I have to reset it many times. I use it from an Iphone 5S. Maybe using an android device could work better...
author: Felipe Torres

review: Really nice streaming device. Good for Netflix, youtube and other streams services.The only con is that there are only few apps on google play.
author: Filipe Ribeiro

review: This device has been great for me and keeps getting better. This product is not only reasonably priced, but also works great and allows me to watch streaming tv from netflix, hulu and hbo go as well as others from any tv with an hdmi port. It's even portable so I can take on on the go too. Great Job Google way to learn from your past mistakes.
author: Amazon Customer
